metadata.title: CVE-2020-6574 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in installer in Google Chrome on OS X priorto 85.0.4183.102 allowed a local attacker to potentially achieve privilegeescalation via a crafted binary.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
